ygData.subject: Re: Corpse retrieval
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh dear.  At level 3 you only get 1/2 hour to get your corpse...after level 6 that s when you get a week...what were you doing in High Pass? Someone lead you
ygData.messageBody:
Oh dear. At level 3 you only get 1/2 hour to get your corpse...after
level 6 that's when you get a week...what were you doing in High Pass?
Someone lead you astray.

Good luck, friend.
Genneth, who wishes she played on your server because one of her
secondary duties is to retrieve corpses.

--- sgj <sgj31@...> wrote:
> From: sgj <sgj31@...>
>
> Hello Everyone.
>
> I'm Tbaald, only a level 3 Half-Elf Ranger on the
> Prexus Server. Ever need
> a Tracker, give me a tell. Right now that's about
> all I can offer a group.
> :) I'm trying to make my way back to High Hold Pass
> to retrieve my corpse.
> ( I believe I have a week of real time while I'm
> below Level 5 or 6. ) The
> group I was with got separated from me while zoning
> and I subsequently had
> no protectors when a Lion decided to take me out. I
> also had no one to loot
> my corpse for me and bring back my stuff.
>
> Looking forward to getting to know everyone here,
> and in the game.
>
> Tbaald
>
>
